nodes.description: 马邦警方逮捕至少350名穆斯林聚居区随机挑选的年轻男子进行问询
nodes.support_text: Mumbai, July 13 The anti-terrorism squad of the Maharashtra police has rounded up at least 350 persons in different parts of the state

nodes.description: 警方拘留多个地区的前禁运组织SIMI活动分子
nodes.support_text: The police decided to detain former activists of the banned Students Islamic Movement of India

nodes.description: 在 Aurangabad 收获包含43公斤RDX的武器弹药库
nodes.support_text: a huge cache of arms and ammunition, including 43 kg of RDX, were recovered from Aurangabad

nodes.description: 成立7支专项调查组追踪爆炸嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: The Maharashtra Government had set up seven teams to track down the bombing suspects

nodes.description: 通过Matunga等火车站至巴基斯坦/迪拜的通话记录锁定目标
nodes.support_text: The police had been looking out for persons who made telephone calls to Pakistan around the time of explosions

nodes.description: 对 STD亭主进行询问以获取通话者特征
nodes.support_text: Owners of STD booths were being questioned to obtain a description of those who made the phone calls

nodes.description: 根据4名目击者描述制作嫌疑人素描（未向媒体公开）
nodes.support_text: Four persons had come forward to provide descriptions

nodes.description: 法医专家质疑马邦警方关于爆炸物使用RDX的声明
nodes.support_text: Earlier claims by the Mumbai police that RDX was used in the blasts were being questioned by forensic experts

nodes.description: 警方持续寻找可能提前离开住所的人
nodes.support_text: The police had been looking out for persons who made telephone calls to Pakistan around the time of explosions

nodes.description: 齐亚布丁·安萨里协调多个伊斯兰运动组织成员
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：齐亚布丁·安萨里协调多个伊斯兰运动组织成员

edges.support_text: The police decided to detain former activists of the banned Students Islamic Movement of India
since a huge cache of arms and ammunition, including 43 kg of RDX, were recovered from Aurangabad
The Maharashtra Government had set up seven teams to track down the bombing suspects
Earlier claims by the Mumbai police that RDX was used in the blasts were being questioned by forensic experts
The police had been looking out for persons who made telephone calls to Pakistan around the time of explosions
Owners of STD booths were being questioned to obtain a description of those who made the phone calls
Four persons had come forward to provide descriptions
Earlier claims by the Mumbai police that RDX was used in the blasts were being questioned by forensic experts
基于语义描述的时序关联
根据语义描述的时序关联，协调行动发生在被捕前
